name: Discord Drive Uploader
description: Upload Discord photos and videos to Google Drive automatically

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Google OAuth2 Client ID from Google Cloud Console

GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Google OAuth2 Client Secret from Google Cloud Console

GOOGLE_REDIRECT_URI.description: OAuth redirect URI (update after deployment with actual URL)

DISCORD_APPLICATION_ID.description: Discord Application ID from Discord Developer Portal

DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN.description: Discord Bot Token (optional - can be set later in setup)
